entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
